About SIB - https://www.sib.swiss

The SIB Swiss Institute of Bioinformatics is an internationally recognized non-profit organization, dedicated to biological and biomedical data science. The institute contributes to keeping Switzerland at the forefront of innovation by fostering progress in biological research and enhancing health.

What we do »

About Training

The SIB Training courses ensure that bioinformaticians and life scientists make the best of the latest advances in the field of computational biology.
